Incandescent Strike.name: Incandescent Strike
Incandescent Strike.fullText:
Incandescent Champion Attack 11Incandescent Strike

When you strike, intense light pours from your weapon, leaching all color from the area and blinding your foe.

Encounter        Augmentable, Psionic, Weapon
Standard Action      Melee weapon

Target: One creature

Attack: Charisma vs. AC

Hit: 1[W] + Charisma modifier damage, and the target is blinded until the end of your next turn.

Augment 2

Hit: 2[W] + Charisma modifier damage, and the target is blinded until the end of your next turn.

Effect: Each enemy within 3 squares of you takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls until the end of your next turn.


Published in Psionic Power, page(s) 25.
Incandescent Strike.flavor: When you strike, intense light pours from your weapon, leaching all color from the area and blinding your foe.
Incandescent Strike.onHit: 2[W] + Charisma modifier damage, and the target is blinded until the end of your next turn.
Incandescent Strike.effect: Each enemy within 3 squares of you takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls until the end of your next turn.

Perfect Incandescence.name: Perfect Incandescence
Perfect Incandescence.fullText:
Incandescent Champion Attack 20Perfect Incandescence

As you attack, your soul’s perfection spills forth, transforming you into a being of pure radiance.

Daily        Polymorph, Psionic, Radiant, Weapon
Standard Action      Close burst 1

Target: Each enemy you can see in the burst

Attack: Charisma vs. Fortitude

Hit: 2[W] + Charisma modifier radiant damage, and the target is blinded (save ends).

Miss: Half damage, and the target takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls (save ends).

Effect: Until the end of the encounter, you are insubstantial and gain fly 8 (hover). You emit light from your Incandescent Presence feature out to a number of squares equal to your Charisma modifier (minimum 3).


Published in Psionic Power, page(s) 25.
Perfect Incandescence.flavor: As you attack, your soul’s perfection spills forth, transforming you into a being of pure radiance.
Perfect Incandescence.target: Each enemy you can see in the burst
Perfect Incandescence.onHit: 2[W] + Charisma modifier radiant damage, and the target is blinded (save ends).
Perfect Incandescence.onMiss: Half damage, and the target takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls (save ends).
Perfect Incandescence.effect: Until the end of the encounter, you are insubstantial and gain fly 8 (hover). You emit light from your Incandescent Presence feature out to a number of squares equal to your Charisma modifier (minimum 3).

Unbearable Countenance.name: Unbearable Countenance
Unbearable Countenance.fullText:
Incandescent Champion Utility 12Unbearable Countenance

The perfection of your soul burns so brightly that your terrified enemies cannot bear to look upon you.

Daily        Fear, Polymorph, Psionic
Minor Action      Personal

Effect: Until the end of the encounter, any enemy that makes an attack that includes you as a target takes a -2 penalty to its attack rolls for that attack.


Published in Psionic Power, page(s) 25.
Unbearable Countenance.flavor: The perfection of your soul burns so brightly that your terrified enemies cannot bear to look upon you.
Unbearable Countenance.effect: Until the end of the encounter, any enemy that makes an attack that includes you as a target takes a -2 penalty to its attack rolls for that attack.
